comment: There's no such thing as psychopaths or sociopaths, introverts or extroverts, alphas or betas, etc. everyone is a product of motivation. in other words, people are only willing to do what they aremotivatedto do.
amr:
# ::snt There's no such thing as psychopaths or sociopaths, introverts or extroverts, alphas or betas, etc. everyone is a product of motivation. in other words, people are only willing to do what they aremotivatedto do.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / produce-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (m2 / motivate-01)
            :ARG1 (e / everyone))
      :snt2 (w / will-02
            :ARG0 (p2 / person)
            :ARG1 (d / do-02
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (d2 / do-02
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :ARG2-of (m3 / motivate-01
                                    :ARG1 p2))))
            :mod (o / only)
            :ARG1-of (m4 / mean-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person)
                  :ARG1 (d3 / do-02
                        :ARG0 p3
                        :ARG1 t))
            :ARG2-of m4))
